sourcesContent: import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { EmployeeContext } from '../context/EmployeeContext' import { useContext } from 'react' import EditForm from './EditForm' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Employee = ({employee}) => { const {deleteEmployee} = useContext(EmployeeContext) const [show, setShow] = useState(false) const handleShow = () => setShow(true) const handleClose= () => setShow(false) useEffect(() => { handleClose() }, [employee]) return ( {employee.name} {employee.gender} {employee.email} {employee.address} {employee.phone} {employee.role} Edit Employee ) } export default Employee
